description:
Successor to http://anidb.net/ch48881 [Tomahawk]. In addition to armament, movement was improved with a wider degree of freedom in the joints. Like all destroids of this generation, rollers are installed in the soles of the feet to overcome the issue of speed.
Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macross2/destroid-tomahawkii.htm
name: Tomahawk Mk.II
